author: admin
title: Global OpenStack Services Market 2015-2019
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 3:18 PM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About OpenStack servicesOpenStack is an open-source cloud-based computing technology that was initiated as a joint project by Rackspace and NASA in 2010. Currently, it is supported by vendors, including Cisco, Dell, HP, IBM, Intel, Oracle, Red Hat, and Vmware. The Openstack foundation has attracted global attention not only toward contribution to the development and improvisation of the software but also in being recognized as vital need for adoption due to its several benefits. It has over 450 supporting companies, with developers across over 100 countries proliferating at a great pace. Technavio's analysts forecast the global OpenStack services market to grow at a CAGR of 32.90% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this report This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global OpenStack services market for the period 2015-2019. The report covers geographical segmentation of the market based on the three key regions: America, APAC, and EMEA. It also covers the major key customer segments.Technavio's report, Global OpenStack Services Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. It covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes the profile of key vendors operating in this market. Key vendors
